original_title: The Best of Funny Business: Vol. 4
overview: Charlie Chase can make even the most poker-faced country star crack. Watch him make big names like Kenny Rogers, the Oak Ridge Boys, Jerry Clower, Restless Heart, Vince Gill, Misty Rowe and Florence Henderson bust a gut when he pulls all sorts of crazy pranks. The gags don't stop with "Funny Business," and this collection gathers the funniest episodes of this short-lived but popular TNN series.
title: The Best of Funny Business: Vol. 4
